00101 void ResetMilitia()
00102 {
00103       BOOLEAN fBattleInProgress = FALSE;
00104 
00105       if ( gWorldSectorX !=0 && gWorldSectorY != 0 && NumEnemiesInSector( gWorldSectorX, gWorldSectorY ) )
00106             fBattleInProgress = TRUE;
00107 
00108       if( ( gfStrategicMilitiaChangesMade && !fBattleInProgress ) || gTacticalStatus.uiFlags & LOADING_SAVED_GAME || gfMSResetMilitia )
00109       {
00110             gfStrategicMilitiaChangesMade = FALSE;
00111             
00112             if( !gfMSResetMilitia )
00113                   RemoveMilitiaFromTactical();
00114             PrepareMilitiaForTactical();
00115             gfMSResetMilitia = FALSE;
00116       }
00117 }
00118 
00119 void RemoveMilitiaFromTactical()
00120 {
00121       SOLDIERINITNODE *curr;
00122       INT32 i;
00123       for( i = gTacticalStatus.Team[ MILITIA_TEAM ].bFirstID; i <= gTacticalStatus.Team[ MILITIA_TEAM ].bLastID; i++ )
00124       {
00125             if( MercPtrs[ i ]->bActive )
00126             {
00127                   TacticalRemoveSoldier( MercPtrs[ i ]->ubID );
00128             }
00129       }
00130       curr = gSoldierInitHead;
00131       while( curr )
00132       {
00133             if( curr->pBasicPlacement->bTeam == MILITIA_TEAM )
00134             { 
00135                   curr->pSoldier = NULL;
00136             }
00137             curr = curr->next;
00138       }
00139 }
00140 
00141 void PrepareMilitiaForTactical()
00142 {
00143       SECTORINFO *pSector;
00144       INT32 x;
00145       UINT8 ubGreen, ubRegs, ubElites;
00146       if( gbWorldSectorZ > 0 )
00147             return;
00148 
00149       // Do we have a loaded sector?
00150       if ( gWorldSectorX ==0 && gWorldSectorY == 0 )
00151             return;
00152 
00153       pSector = &SectorInfo[ SECTOR( gWorldSectorX, gWorldSectorY ) ];
00154       ubGreen = pSector->ubNumberOfCivsAtLevel[ GREEN_MILITIA ];
00155       ubRegs = pSector->ubNumberOfCivsAtLevel[ REGULAR_MILITIA ];
00156       ubElites = pSector->ubNumberOfCivsAtLevel[ ELITE_MILITIA ];
00157       
00158       if(guiDirNumber)
00159             for( x = 0 ; x < guiDirNumber ; ++x )
00160             {
00161 //                ScreenMsg( FONT_MCOLOR_LTYELLOW, MSG_INTERFACE, L"%ld,%ld,%ld,%ld", gpAttackDirs[ x ][ 0 ], gpAttackDirs[ x ][1], gpAttackDirs[ x ][2], gpAttackDirs[ x ][3] );
00162                   if( gfMSResetMilitia )
00163                   {
00164                         if( gpAttackDirs[ x ][ 3 ] != INSERTION_CODE_CENTER )
00165                               AddSoldierInitListMilitiaOnEdge( gpAttackDirs[ x ][ 3 ], gpAttackDirs[ x ][0], gpAttackDirs[ x ][1], gpAttackDirs[ x ][2] );
00166                   }
00167                   else
00168                         if( gpAttackDirs[ x ][ 3 ] == INSERTION_CODE_CENTER )
00169                               AddSoldierInitListMilitia( gpAttackDirs[ x ][0], gpAttackDirs[ x ][1], gpAttackDirs[ x ][2] );
00170                         else
00171                               AddSoldierInitListMilitiaOnEdge( gpAttackDirs[ x ][ 3 ], gpAttackDirs[ x ][0], gpAttackDirs[ x ][1], gpAttackDirs[ x ][2] );
00172 
00173             }
00174             else AddSoldierInitListMilitia( ubGreen, ubRegs, ubElites );
00175       
00176 //    for( i = gTacticalStatus.Team[ MILITIA_TEAM ].bFirstID; i <= gTacticalStatus.Team[ MILITIA_TEAM ].bLastID; i++ )
00177 //    {
00178 //          if( MercPtrs[ i ]->bInSector )
00179 //          {
00180 //                MercPtrs[ i ]->bOrders = SEEKENEMY;
00181 ////              MercPtrs[ i ]->bAttitude = AGGRESSIVE;
00182 //          }
00183 //    }
00184       guiDirNumber = 0;
00185 }

00187 void HandleMilitiaPromotions( void )
00188 {
00189       UINT8                               cnt;
00190       UINT8                               ubMilitiaRank;
00191       SOLDIERTYPE *           pTeamSoldier;
00192       UINT8                               ubPromotions;
00193 
00194       gbGreenToElitePromotions = 0;
00195       gbGreenToRegPromotions = 0;
00196       gbRegToElitePromotions = 0;
00197       gbMilitiaPromotions = 0;
00198 
00199       cnt = gTacticalStatus.Team[ MILITIA_TEAM ].bFirstID;
00200 
00201       for ( pTeamSoldier = MercPtrs[ cnt ]; cnt <= gTacticalStatus.Team[ MILITIA_TEAM ].bLastID; cnt++, pTeamSoldier++)
00202       {
00203             if ( pTeamSoldier->bActive && pTeamSoldier->bInSector && pTeamSoldier->bLife > 0 )
00204             {
00205                   if ( pTeamSoldier->ubMilitiaKills > 0 )
00206                   {     
00207                         ubMilitiaRank = SoldierClassToMilitiaRank( pTeamSoldier->ubSoldierClass );
00208                         ubPromotions = CheckOneMilitiaForPromotion( gWorldSectorX, gWorldSectorY, ubMilitiaRank, pTeamSoldier->ubMilitiaKills );
00209                         if( ubPromotions )
00210                         {
00211                               if( ubPromotions == 2 )
00212                               {
00213                                     gbGreenToElitePromotions++;
00214                                     gbMilitiaPromotions++;
00215                               }
00216                               else if( pTeamSoldier->ubSoldierClass == SOLDIER_CLASS_GREEN_MILITIA )
00217                               {
00218                                     gbGreenToRegPromotions++;
00219                                     gbMilitiaPromotions++;
00220                               }
00221                               else if( pTeamSoldier->ubSoldierClass == SOLDIER_CLASS_REG_MILITIA )
00222                               {
00223                                     gbRegToElitePromotions++;
00224                                     gbMilitiaPromotions++;
00225                               }
00226                         }
00227 
00228                         pTeamSoldier->ubMilitiaKills = 0;
00229                   }
00230             }
00231       }
00232       if( gbMilitiaPromotions )
00233       {
00234     // ATE: Problems here with bringing up message box...
00235 
00236             // UINT16 str[ 512 ];
00237             // BuildMilitiaPromotionsString( str );
00238             // DoScreenIndependantMessageBox( str, MSG_BOX_FLAG_OK, NULL );
00239       }
00240 }

00259 void RebuildMilitiaControlBox( void )
00260 {
00261       // destroy and recreate MilitiaControls box
00262       if ( ghMilitiaControlBox != -1 )
00263       {
00264             RemoveBox( ghMilitiaControlBox );
00265             ghMilitiaControlBox = -1;
00266       }
00267 
00268       CreateMilitiaControlBox( );
00269 }

00272 void MilitiaControlMenuMvtCallBack(MOUSE_REGION * pRegion, INT32 iReason )
00273 {
00274       // mvt callback handler for MilitiaControl region
00275       INT32 iValue = -1;
00276       
00277       iValue = MSYS_GetRegionUserData( pRegion, 0 );
00278 
00279       if (iReason & MSYS_CALLBACK_REASON_GAIN_MOUSE )
00280       {
00281             // highlight string
00282             if( GetBoxShadeFlag( ghMilitiaControlBox, iValue ) == FALSE )
00283             {
00284                   // get the string line handle
00285                   HighLightBoxLine( ghMilitiaControlBox, iValue );
00286             }
00287       }
00288       else if (iReason & MSYS_CALLBACK_REASON_LOST_MOUSE )
00289       {
00290             // unhighlight all strings in box
00291             UnHighLightBox( ghMilitiaControlBox );
00292       }
00293 }

00299 void DetermineWhichMilitiaControlMenusCanBeShown( void )
00300 {
00301       BOOLEAN fCharacterNoLongerValid = FALSE;
00302       SOLDIERTYPE *pSoldier = NULL;
00303 
00304       if ( (guiTacticalInterfaceFlags & INTERFACE_MAPSCREEN ) )
00305       {
00306             if( fShowMapScreenMovementList == TRUE )
00307             {
00308                   if( bSelectedDestChar == -1 )
00309                   {
00310                         fCharacterNoLongerValid = TRUE;
00311                         //HandleShowingOfMovementBox( ); //laltodo
00312                   }
00313                   else
00314                   {
00315                         fShowMapScreenMovementList = FALSE;
00316                         fCharacterNoLongerValid = TRUE;
00317                   }
00318             }
00319             else if( bSelectedAssignChar == -1 )
00320             {
00321                   fCharacterNoLongerValid = TRUE;
00322             }
00323 
00324             // update the assignment positions
00325             UpdateMapScreenMilitiaControlPositions( );
00326       }
00327       //ScreenMsg( FONT_WHITE, MSG_INTERFACE, L"start DetermineWhichMilitiaControlMenusCanBeShown" );
00328 
00329       // determine which assign menu needs to be shown
00330       if( ( ( fShowMilitiaControlMenu == FALSE ) )||( fCharacterNoLongerValid == TRUE ) )
00331       {
00332             // reset show MilitiaControl menu
00333             fShowMilitiaControlMenu = FALSE;
00334             //fShowTalkToAllMenu = FALSE;
00335 
00336             //ScreenMsg( FONT_WHITE, MSG_INTERFACE, L"ShowMilitiaControlMenu = FALSE" );
00337 
00338             // destroy mask, if needed
00339             CreateDestroyScreenMaskForMilitiaControlMenus( );
00340             
00341             // destroy menu if needed
00342             CreateDestroyMouseRegionsForMilitiaControlMenu( );
00343             //CreateDestroyMouseRegionsForTalkToAllMenu( );
00344 
00345             if ( IsBoxShown( ghMilitiaControlBox ) )
00346             {
00347                   HideBox( ghMilitiaControlBox );
00348                   fTeamPanelDirty = TRUE;
00349                   gfRenderPBInterface = TRUE;
00350             }
00351 
00352             //if ( IsBoxShown( ghTalkToAllBox ) )
00353             //{
00354             //    HideBox( ghTalkToAllBox );
00355             //    fTeamPanelDirty = TRUE;
00356             //    gfRenderPBInterface = TRUE;
00357             //}         
00358 
00359             // no menus, leave
00360             return;
00361       }
00362 
00363       // update the assignment positions
00364       UpdateMapScreenMilitiaControlPositions( );
00365 
00366       // create mask, if needed
00367       CreateDestroyScreenMaskForMilitiaControlMenus( );
00368 
00369       // created assignment menu if needed
00370       CreateDestroyMouseRegionsForMilitiaControlMenu( ); 
00371       //CreateDestroyMouseRegionsForTalkToAllMenu( ); 
00372 
00373       // Militia Command menu
00374       if( fShowMilitiaControlMenu == TRUE )
00375       {
00376             HandleShadingOfLinesForMilitiaControlMenu( );
00377             ShowBox( ghMilitiaControlBox );
00378       }
00379       else
00380       {
00381             if( IsBoxShown( ghMilitiaControlBox ) )
00382             {
00383                   HideBox( ghMilitiaControlBox );
00384                   fTeamPanelDirty = TRUE;
00385                   fMapPanelDirty = TRUE;
00386                   gfRenderPBInterface = TRUE;   
00387             }
00388       }
00389 
00390       // Talk to all menu
00391       //if( fShowTalkToAllMenu == TRUE )
00392       //{
00393       //    HandleShadingOfLinesForTalkToAllMenu( );
00394       //    ShowBox( ghTalkToAllBox );
00395       //}
00396       //else
00397       //{
00398       //    if( IsBoxShown( ghTalkToAllBox ) )
00399       //    {
00400       //          HideBox( ghTalkToAllBox );
00401       //          fTeamPanelDirty = TRUE;
00402       //          fMapPanelDirty = TRUE;
00403       //          gfRenderPBInterface = TRUE;   
00404       //    }
00405       //}
00406 
00407       return;
00408 }
00409 
00410 void CreateDestroyScreenMaskForMilitiaControlMenus( void )
00411 {
00412       static BOOLEAN fCreated = FALSE;
00413       // will create a screen mask to catch mouse input to disable MilitiaControl menus
00414 
00415       // not created, create
00416       if( ( fCreated == FALSE ) && ( fShowMilitiaControlMenu == TRUE ) )
00417       {
00418             MSYS_DefineRegion( &gMilitiaControlScreenMaskRegion, 0, 0, SCREEN_WIDTH, SCREEN_HEIGHT, MSYS_PRIORITY_HIGHEST - 4 ,
00419                   MSYS_NO_CURSOR, MSYS_NO_CALLBACK, MilitiaControlScreenMaskBtnCallback );
00420 
00421             // created
00422             fCreated = TRUE;
00423 
00424             if ( !(guiTacticalInterfaceFlags & INTERFACE_MAPSCREEN ) )
00425             {
00426                   MSYS_ChangeRegionCursor(  &gMilitiaControlScreenMaskRegion, 0 );
00427             }
00428       }
00429       else if( ( fCreated == TRUE ) && ( fShowMilitiaControlMenu == FALSE ) )
00430       {
00431             // created, get rid of it
00432             MSYS_RemoveRegion(  &gMilitiaControlScreenMaskRegion );
00433 
00434             // not created
00435             fCreated = FALSE;
00436       }
00437 
00438       return;
00439 }
00440 
00441 
00442 void MilitiaControlScreenMaskBtnCallback(MOUSE_REGION * pRegion, INT32 iReason )
00443 {
00444       // btn callback handler for MilitiaControl screen mask region
00445       
00446       if( ( iReason & MSYS_CALLBACK_REASON_LBUTTON_UP ) || ( iReason & MSYS_CALLBACK_REASON_RBUTTON_UP ) )
00447       {
00448             if( fFirstClickInMilitiaControlScreenMask == TRUE )
00449             {
00450                   fFirstClickInMilitiaControlScreenMask = FALSE;
00451                   return;
00452             }
00453 
00454             // button event, stop showing menus
00455             fShowMilitiaControlMenu = FALSE;
00456 
00457             // update mapscreen
00458             fTeamPanelDirty = TRUE;
00459             fCharacterInfoPanelDirty = TRUE;
00460             fMapScreenBottomDirty = TRUE;
00461 
00462             gfRenderPBInterface = TRUE;
00463             SetRenderFlags( RENDER_FLAG_FULL );
00464       }
00465       return;
00466 }

00470 void CreateDestroyMouseRegionsForMilitiaControlMenu( void )
00471 {
00472       static BOOLEAN fCreated = FALSE;
00473       UINT32 iCounter = 0;
00474       INT32 iFontHeight = 0;
00475       INT32 iBoxXPosition = 0;
00476       INT32 iBoxYPosition = 0;
00477       SOLDIERTYPE *pSoldier = NULL;
00478       SGPPoint pPosition;
00479       INT32 iBoxWidth = 0;
00480       SGPRect pDimensions;
00481       static BOOLEAN fShowRemoveMenu = FALSE;
00482 
00483 
00484       // will create/destroy mouse regions for the map screen assignment main menu
00485       // check if we can only remove character from team..not assign
00486       //if( ( bSelectedAssignChar != -1 ) || ( fShowRemoveMenu == TRUE ) )
00487       //{
00488       //    if( fShowRemoveMenu == TRUE )
00489       //    {
00490       //          // dead guy handle menu stuff
00491       //          fShowRemoveMenu = fShowMilitiaControlMenu | fShowContractMenu;
00492       //          
00493       //          CreateDestroyMouseRegionsForRemoveMenu( );
00494 
00495       //          return;
00496       //    }
00497       //    if( ( Menptr[gCharactersList[bSelectedAssignChar].usSolID].bLife == 0 ) || ( Menptr[gCharactersList[bSelectedAssignChar].usSolID].bMilitiaControl == MilitiaControl_POW ) )
00498       //    {
00499       //          // dead guy handle menu stuff
00500       //          fShowRemoveMenu = fShowMilitiaControlMenu | fShowContractMenu;
00501       //    
00502       //          CreateDestroyMouseRegionsForRemoveMenu( );
00503 
00504       //          return;
00505       //    }
00506       //}
00507 
00508 
00509       if( ( fShowMilitiaControlMenu == TRUE ) && ( fCreated == FALSE ) )
00510       {
00511             gfIgnoreScrolling = FALSE;
00512 
00513             if( ( fShowMilitiaControlMenu ) && ( guiCurrentScreen == MAP_SCREEN ) ) 
00514             {
00515               SetBoxPosition( ghMilitiaControlBox, MilitiaControlPosition );
00516             }
00517 
00518             //pSoldier = GetSelectedAssignSoldier( FALSE );
00519 
00520             //if( pSoldier -> ubWhatKindOfMercAmI != MERC_TYPE__EPC ) //laltodo
00521             {
00522                   // grab height of font
00523                   iFontHeight = GetLineSpace( ghMilitiaControlBox ) + GetFontHeight( GetBoxFont( ghMilitiaControlBox ) ); 
00524 
00525                   // get x.y position of box
00526                   GetBoxPosition( ghMilitiaControlBox, &pPosition);
00527 
00528                   // grab box x and y position
00529                   iBoxXPosition = pPosition.iX;
00530                   iBoxYPosition = pPosition.iY;
00531 
00532                   // get dimensions..mostly for width
00533                   GetBoxSize( ghMilitiaControlBox, &pDimensions );
00534 
00535                   // get width
00536                   iBoxWidth = pDimensions.iRight;
00537 
00538                   SetCurrentBox( ghMilitiaControlBox );
00539             }
00540             
00541 
00542             // define regions
00543             for( iCounter = 0; iCounter < GetNumberOfLinesOfTextInBox( ghMilitiaControlBox ); iCounter++ )
00544             {
00545                   // add mouse region for each line of text..and set user data
00546                   MSYS_DefineRegion( &gMilitiaControlMenuRegion[ iCounter ],  ( INT16 )( iBoxXPosition ), ( INT16 )( iBoxYPosition + GetTopMarginSize( ghMilitiaControlBox ) + ( iFontHeight ) * iCounter ), ( INT16 )( iBoxXPosition + iBoxWidth ), ( INT16 )( iBoxYPosition + GetTopMarginSize( ghMilitiaControlBox ) + ( iFontHeight ) * ( iCounter + 1 ) ), MSYS_PRIORITY_HIGHEST - 4 ,
00547                                            MSYS_NO_CURSOR, MilitiaControlMenuMvtCallBack, MilitiaControlMenuBtnCallBack );
00548 
00549                   MSYS_SetRegionUserData( &gMilitiaControlMenuRegion[ iCounter ], 0, iCounter );
00550             }
00551 
00552             // created
00553             fCreated = TRUE;
00554 
00555             // unhighlight all strings in box
00556             UnHighLightBox( ghMilitiaControlBox );
00557             CheckAndUpdateTacticalMilitiaControlPopUpPositions( );
00558 
00559             //PositionCursorForMilitiaControlBox( );
00560       }
00561       else if( ( fShowMilitiaControlMenu == FALSE ) && ( fCreated == TRUE ) )
00562       {
00563             // destroy 
00564             for( iCounter = 0; iCounter < GetNumberOfLinesOfTextInBox( ghMilitiaControlBox ); iCounter++ )
00565             {
00566                   MSYS_RemoveRegion( &gMilitiaControlMenuRegion[ iCounter ] );
00567             }
00568 
00569             // not created
00570             fCreated = FALSE;
00571             SetRenderFlags( RENDER_FLAG_FULL );
00572       }
00573 }

00576 
00577 void CreateMilitiaControlBox( void )
00578 {
00579  UINT32 hStringHandle;
00580  UINT32 uiCounter;
00581  CHAR16 sString[ 128 ];
00582  //SOLDIERTYPE *pSoldier = NULL;
00583 
00584 
00585  // will create attribute pop up menu for mapscreen MilitiaControls
00586 
00587       MilitiaControlPosition.iX = OrigMilitiaControlPosition.iX;
00588 
00589       if( giBoxY != 0 )
00590       {
00591             MilitiaControlPosition.iY = giBoxY;
00592       }
00593 
00594       //pSoldier = GetSelectedAssignSoldier( TRUE );
00595       // pSoldier NULL is legal here!  Gets called during every mapscreen initialization even when nobody is assign char
00596 
00597       // create basic box
00598       CreatePopUpBox(&ghMilitiaControlBox, MilitiaControlDimensions, MilitiaControlPosition, (POPUP_BOX_FLAG_CLIP_TEXT|POPUP_BOX_FLAG_CENTER_TEXT|POPUP_BOX_FLAG_RESIZE ));
00599  
00600       // which buffer will box render to
00601       SetBoxBuffer(ghMilitiaControlBox, FRAME_BUFFER);
00602 
00603       // border type?
00604       SetBorderType(ghMilitiaControlBox,guiPOPUPBORDERS);
00605 
00606       // background texture
00607       SetBackGroundSurface(ghMilitiaControlBox, guiPOPUPTEX);
00608 
00609       // margin sizes
00610       SetMargins(ghMilitiaControlBox, 6, 6, 4, 4 );
00611 
00612       // space between lines
00613       SetLineSpace(ghMilitiaControlBox, 2);
00614 
00615       // set current box to this one
00616       SetCurrentBox( ghMilitiaControlBox );
00617 
00618       // add strings for box
00619       for(uiCounter=0; uiCounter < MAX_MILCON_STRING_COUNT; uiCounter++)
00620       {
00621             swprintf( sString, pMilitiaControlMenuStrings[uiCounter] );
00622 
00623             AddMonoString(&hStringHandle, sString );
00624   
00625             // make sure it is unhighlighted
00626             UnHighLightLine(hStringHandle);
00627       }
00628 
00629       // set font type
00630       SetBoxFont(ghMilitiaControlBox, MAP_SCREEN_FONT);
00631 
00632       // set highlight color
00633       SetBoxHighLight(ghMilitiaControlBox, FONT_WHITE);
00634 
00635       // unhighlighted color
00636       SetBoxForeground(ghMilitiaControlBox, FONT_LTGREEN);
00637 
00638       // background color
00639       SetBoxBackground(ghMilitiaControlBox, FONT_BLACK);
00640 
00641       // shaded color..for darkened text
00642       SetBoxShade( ghMilitiaControlBox, FONT_GRAY7 );
00643       SetBoxSecondaryShade( ghMilitiaControlBox, FONT_YELLOW );
00644 
00645        // resize box to text
00646       ResizeBoxToText( ghMilitiaControlBox );
00647 
00648       //DetermineMilitiaControlBoxPositions( ); //laltodo
00649 }
00650 
00651 
00652 BOOLEAN CreateDestroyMilitiaControlPopUpBoxes( void )
00653 {
00654       static BOOLEAN fCreated= FALSE;
00655       VSURFACE_DESC           vs_desc;
00656       VOBJECT_DESC    VObjectDesc; 
00657 
00658 
00659       if( ( fShowMilitiaControlMenu == TRUE ) && ( fCreated == FALSE ) )
00660       {
00661             VObjectDesc.fCreateFlags=VOBJECT_CREATE_FROMFILE;
00662             FilenameForBPP("INTERFACE\\popup.sti", VObjectDesc.ImageFile);
00663             CHECKF(AddVideoObject(&VObjectDesc, &guiPOPUPBORDERS));
00664 
00665             vs_desc.fCreateFlags = VSURFACE_CREATE_FROMFILE | VSURFACE_SYSTEM_MEM_USAGE;
00666             strcpy(vs_desc.ImageFile, "INTERFACE\\popupbackground.pcx");
00667             CHECKF(AddVideoSurface(&vs_desc, &guiPOPUPTEX));
00668 
00669             // these boxes are always created while in mapscreen...
00670             CreateMilitiaControlBox( );
00671             //CreateTalkToAllBox( );
00672 
00673             UpdateMapScreenMilitiaControlPositions( );
00674 
00675             fCreated = TRUE;
00676       }
00677       else if( ( fShowMilitiaControlMenu == FALSE ) && ( fCreated == TRUE ) )
00678       {
00679             DeleteVideoObjectFromIndex(guiPOPUPBORDERS);
00680             DeleteVideoSurfaceFromIndex(guiPOPUPTEX);
00681 
00682             RemoveBox(ghMilitiaControlBox);
00683             ghMilitiaControlBox = -1;
00684 
00685             //RemoveBox(ghTalkToAllBox);
00686             //ghTalkToAllBox = -1;
00687 
00688             fCreated = FALSE;
00689             gfIgnoreScrolling = FALSE;          
00690       }
00691 
00692       return( TRUE );
00693 }
00694 
00695 
00696 void DetermineMilitiaControlBoxPositions( void )
00697 {
00698       // depending on how many boxes there are, reposition as needed
00699       SGPPoint pPoint;
00700       SGPPoint pNewPoint;
00701       SGPRect pDimensions;
00702       SOLDIERTYPE *pSoldier = NULL;
00703 
00704 
00705       if( ( fShowMilitiaControlMenu == FALSE ) || ( ghMilitiaControlBox == -1 ) )
00706       {
00707             return;
00708       }
00709 
00710       pSoldier = GetSelectedAssignSoldier( TRUE );
00711       // pSoldier NULL is legal here!  Gets called during every mapscreen initialization even when nobody is assign char
00712       if ( pSoldier == NULL )
00713       {
00714             return;
00715       }
00716 
00717       if ( (guiTacticalInterfaceFlags & INTERFACE_MAPSCREEN ) )
00718       {
00719             GetBoxPosition( ghMilitiaControlBox, &pPoint );
00720             gsMilitiaControlBoxesX = ( INT16 )pPoint.iX;
00721             gsMilitiaControlBoxesY = ( INT16 )pPoint.iY;
00722       }
00723 
00724       pPoint.iX = gsMilitiaControlBoxesX;
00725       pPoint.iY = gsMilitiaControlBoxesY;
00726 
00727       
00728       SetBoxPosition( ghMilitiaControlBox, pPoint );
00729       GetBoxSize( ghMilitiaControlBox, &pDimensions );
00730       
00731 
00732       // hang it right beside the MilitiaControl/EPC box menu
00733       pNewPoint.iX = pPoint.iX + pDimensions.iRight;
00734       pNewPoint.iY = pPoint.iY;
00735 
00736 
00737 
00738       //if( ( fShowTalkToAllMenu == TRUE ) && ( ghTalkToAllBox != -1 ) )
00739       //{
00740       //    pNewPoint.iY += ( ( GetFontHeight( MAP_SCREEN_FONT ) + 2 ) * MILCON_MENU_ALL );
00741       //    SetBoxPosition( ghTalkToAllBox, pNewPoint );
00742       //    TrainPosition.iX = pNewPoint.iX;
00743       //    TrainPosition.iY = pNewPoint.iY;
00744       //    OrigTrainPosition.iY = pNewPoint.iY;
00745       //    OrigTrainPosition.iX = pNewPoint.iX;
00746 
00747       //    GetBoxSize( ghTalkToAllBox, &pDimensions );
00748       //    GetBoxPosition( ghTalkToAllBox, &pPoint );
00749       //}
00750 
00751       return;
00752 }
00753 
00754 
00755 
00756 void SetTacticalPopUpMilitiaControlBoxXY( SOLDIERTYPE *pSoldier )
00757 {
00758       INT16 sX, sY;
00759       //SOLDIERTYPE *pSoldier;
00760 
00761       //get the soldier
00762       //pSoldier = GetSelectedAssignSoldier( FALSE ); //gives wrong position (0,0) when cursor moved
00763       
00764       //if ( !GetSoldier( &pSoldier, gusSelectedSoldier )  )
00765       //{
00766       //    //ScreenMsg( FONT_WHITE, MSG_INTERFACE, L"No Soldier" );
00767       //    return;
00768       //}
00769 
00770       // grab soldier's x,y screen position
00771       GetSoldierScreenPos( pSoldier, &sX, &sY );
00772       
00773       //ScreenMsg( FONT_WHITE, MSG_INTERFACE, L"X-Position: %d", sX );
00774       //ScreenMsg( FONT_WHITE, MSG_INTERFACE, L"Y-Position: %d", sY );
00775       
00776       if( sX < 0 )
00777       {
00778             sX = 0;
00779       }
00780 
00781       gsMilitiaControlBoxesX = sX + 30;
00782       
00783       if( sY < 0 )
00784       {
00785             sY = 0;
00786       }
00787       
00788       gsMilitiaControlBoxesY = sY;
00789 
00790       // ATE: Check if we are past tactical viewport....
00791       // Use estimate width's/heights
00792       if ( ( gsMilitiaControlBoxesX + 100 ) > SCREEN_WIDTH )
00793       {
00794             gsMilitiaControlBoxesX = SCREEN_WIDTH - 100;
00795       }
00796 
00797       if ( ( gsMilitiaControlBoxesY + 130 ) > SCREEN_HEIGHT )
00798       {
00799             gsMilitiaControlBoxesY = SCREEN_HEIGHT - 190;
00800       }
00801 
00802       return;
00803 }
00804 
00805 
00806 void CheckAndUpdateTacticalMilitiaControlPopUpPositions( void )
00807 {
00808       SGPRect pDimensions2;
00809       SGPPoint pPoint;  
00810       //SOLDIERTYPE *pSoldier = NULL;
00811 
00812 
00813       if( fShowMilitiaControlMenu == FALSE )
00814       {
00815             return;
00816       }
00817 
00818       if ( (guiTacticalInterfaceFlags & INTERFACE_MAPSCREEN ) )
00819       {
00820             return;
00821       }
00822 
00823       //get the soldier
00824       //pSoldier = GetSelectedAssignSoldier( FALSE );
00825 
00826       //if( pSoldier -> ubWhatKindOfMercAmI == MERC_TYPE__EPC ) //laltodo
00827       {
00828             GetBoxSize( ghMilitiaControlBox, &pDimensions2 );
00829       }
00830 
00831       // just the MilitiaControl box
00832       if( gsMilitiaControlBoxesX + pDimensions2.iRight  >= SCREEN_WIDTH ) 
00833       {
00834             gsMilitiaControlBoxesX = ( INT16 ) ( SCREEN_WIDTH - 1 - ( pDimensions2.iRight  ) );
00835             SetRenderFlags( RENDER_FLAG_FULL );
00836       }
00837 
00838       if( gsMilitiaControlBoxesY + pDimensions2.iBottom  >= SCREEN_HEIGHT-120 )
00839       {
00840             gsMilitiaControlBoxesY = ( INT16 )( SCREEN_HEIGHT - 121 - ( pDimensions2.iBottom  ) );
00841             SetRenderFlags( RENDER_FLAG_FULL );
00842       }
00843 
00844       pPoint.iX = gsMilitiaControlBoxesX;
00845       pPoint.iY = gsMilitiaControlBoxesY;
00846 
00847       //if( pSoldier -> ubWhatKindOfMercAmI != MERC_TYPE__EPC) //laltodo
00848       {
00849             SetBoxPosition( ghMilitiaControlBox, pPoint );
00850       }
00851 
00852       RepositionMouseRegionsForMilitiaControl( );
00853 }
00854 
00855 
00856 void RepositionMouseRegionsForMilitiaControl( void )
00857 {
00858       INT16 sDeltaX, sDeltaY;
00859       INT32 iCounter = 0;
00860 
00861       if( fShowMilitiaControlMenu == TRUE )
00862       {
00863             sDeltaX = gsMilitiaControlBoxesX - gMilitiaControlMenuRegion[ 0 ].RegionTopLeftX;
00864             sDeltaY = ( INT16 ) ( gsMilitiaControlBoxesY - gMilitiaControlMenuRegion[ 0 ].RegionTopLeftY + GetTopMarginSize( ghMilitiaControlBox ) );
00865 
00866             // find the delta from the old to the new, and alter values accordingly
00867             for( iCounter = 0; iCounter < ( INT32 )GetNumberOfLinesOfTextInBox( ghMilitiaControlBox ); iCounter++ )
00868             {
00869                   gMilitiaControlMenuRegion[ iCounter ].RegionTopLeftX += sDeltaX;
00870                   gMilitiaControlMenuRegion[ iCounter ].RegionTopLeftY += sDeltaY;
00871 
00872                   gMilitiaControlMenuRegion[ iCounter ].RegionBottomRightX += sDeltaX;
00873                   gMilitiaControlMenuRegion[ iCounter ].RegionBottomRightY += sDeltaY;
00874             }
00875 
00876             gfPausedTacticalRenderFlags = RENDER_FLAG_FULL;
00877       }
00878 }
00879 
00880 
00881 
00882 void PositionCursorForMilitiaControlBox( void )
00883 {
00884       // position cursor over y of on duty in tactical assignments
00885       SGPPoint pPosition;
00886       SGPRect pDimensions;
00887       INT32 iFontHeight;
00888 
00889       // get x.y position of box
00890       GetBoxPosition( ghMilitiaControlBox, &pPosition);
00891 
00892       // get dimensions..mostly for width
00893       GetBoxSize( ghMilitiaControlBox, &pDimensions );
00894 
00895       iFontHeight = GetLineSpace( ghMilitiaControlBox ) + GetFontHeight( GetBoxFont( ghMilitiaControlBox ) ); 
00896       
00897       if( gGameSettings.fOptions[ TOPTION_DONT_MOVE_MOUSE ] == FALSE )
00898       {
00899             SimulateMouseMovement( pPosition.iX + pDimensions.iRight - 6, pPosition.iY + ( iFontHeight / 2 ) + 2 );
00900       }
00901 }
00902 
00903 
00904 void HandleShadingOfLinesForMilitiaControlMenu( void )
00905 {
00906       SOLDIERTYPE *pSoldier = NULL;
00907       INT16 sDistVisible;
00908 
00909       // check if valid
00910       if( ( fShowMilitiaControlMenu == FALSE ) || ( ghMilitiaControlBox == - 1 ) )
00911       {
00912             return;
00913       }
00914 
00915       if ( GetSoldier( &pSoldier, gusSelectedSoldier )  )
00916       {
00917             sDistVisible = DistanceVisible( pSoldier, DIRECTION_IRRELEVANT, DIRECTION_IRRELEVANT, pTMilitiaSoldier->sGridNo, pTMilitiaSoldier->bLevel, pSoldier );
00918 
00919             // Check LOS!
00920             if ( SoldierTo3DLocationLineOfSightTest( pSoldier, pTMilitiaSoldier->sGridNo,  pTMilitiaSoldier->bLevel, 3, (UINT8) sDistVisible, TRUE ) )
00921             {
00922                   UnShadeStringInBox( ghMilitiaControlBox, MILCON_MENU_ATTACK );
00923                   UnShadeStringInBox( ghMilitiaControlBox, MILCON_MENU_HOLD );
00924                   UnShadeStringInBox( ghMilitiaControlBox, MILCON_MENU_RETREAT );
00925                   UnShadeStringInBox( ghMilitiaControlBox, MILCON_MENU_COMETOME );
00926                   UnShadeStringInBox( ghMilitiaControlBox, MILCON_MENU_GETDOWN );
00927                   UnShadeStringInBox( ghMilitiaControlBox, MILCON_MENU_TAKE_COVER );            
00928             }
00929             else
00930             {
00931                   ShadeStringInBox( ghMilitiaControlBox, MILCON_MENU_ATTACK );
00932                   ShadeStringInBox( ghMilitiaControlBox, MILCON_MENU_HOLD );
00933                   ShadeStringInBox( ghMilitiaControlBox, MILCON_MENU_RETREAT );
00934                   ShadeStringInBox( ghMilitiaControlBox, MILCON_MENU_COMETOME );
00935                   ShadeStringInBox( ghMilitiaControlBox, MILCON_MENU_GETDOWN );
00936                   ShadeStringInBox( ghMilitiaControlBox, MILCON_MENU_TAKE_COVER );
00937             }
00938       }
00939 
00940       if ( CheckIfRadioIsEquipped() )
00941       {
00942             UnShadeStringInBox( ghMilitiaControlBox, MILCON_MENU_ALL_ATTACK );
00943             UnShadeStringInBox( ghMilitiaControlBox, MILCON_MENU_ALL_HOLD );
00944             UnShadeStringInBox( ghMilitiaControlBox, MILCON_MENU_ALL_RETREAT );
00945             UnShadeStringInBox( ghMilitiaControlBox, MILCON_MENU_ALL_COMETOME );
00946             UnShadeStringInBox( ghMilitiaControlBox, MILCON_MENU_ALL_GETDOWN );
00947             UnShadeStringInBox( ghMilitiaControlBox, MILCON_MENU_ALL_TAKE_COVER );
00948             //UnShadeStringInBox( ghMilitiaControlBox, MILCON_MENU_ALL_TAKE_ITEMS );
00949       }
00950       else
00951       {
00952             ShadeStringInBox( ghMilitiaControlBox, MILCON_MENU_ALL_ATTACK );
00953             ShadeStringInBox( ghMilitiaControlBox, MILCON_MENU_ALL_HOLD );
00954             ShadeStringInBox( ghMilitiaControlBox, MILCON_MENU_ALL_RETREAT );
00955             ShadeStringInBox( ghMilitiaControlBox, MILCON_MENU_ALL_COMETOME );
00956             ShadeStringInBox( ghMilitiaControlBox, MILCON_MENU_ALL_GETDOWN );
00957             ShadeStringInBox( ghMilitiaControlBox, MILCON_MENU_ALL_TAKE_COVER );
00958             //ShadeStringInBox( ghMilitiaControlBox, MILCON_MENU_ALL_TAKE_ITEMS );
00959       }
00960       
00961       return;
00962 }
00963 
00964 
00965 BOOLEAN CheckIfRadioIsEquipped( void )
00966 {
00967       SOLDIERTYPE *pSoldier = NULL;
00968       INT8 bSlot;
00969 
00970       // do we have a radio ?
00971       //pSoldier = GetSelectedAssignSoldier( FALSE ); //do not use
00972       
00973       if ( GetSoldier( &pSoldier, gusSelectedSoldier )  )
00974       {     
00975             bSlot = FindObj( pSoldier, EXTENDEDEAR );
00976             //bSlot = FindHearingAid(pSoldier);
00977             //ScreenMsg( FONT_WHITE, MSG_INTERFACE, L"Position: %d", bSlot );
00978       }
00979 
00980       if (( bSlot == HEAD1POS ) || ( bSlot == HEAD2POS))
00981       {
00982             return TRUE;
00983       }
00984       else
00985       {
00986             return FALSE;
00987       }
00988 }

01142 
01143 void MilitiaControlMenuBtnCallBack( MOUSE_REGION * pRegion, INT32 iReason )
01144 {
01145       // btn callback handler for MilitiaControl region
01146       INT32 iValue = -1;
01147       SOLDIERTYPE * pSoldier = NULL;
01148       UINT8 ubVolume = 10;
01149 
01150       //pSoldier = GetSelectedAssignSoldier( FALSE );
01151 
01152       iValue = MSYS_GetRegionUserData( pRegion, 0 );
01153 
01154       if (iReason & MSYS_CALLBACK_REASON_LBUTTON_UP)
01155       {
01156             //if( ( fShowTalkToAllMenu ) )
01157             //{
01158             //    return;
01159             //}
01160 
01161             UnHighLightBox( ghMilitiaControlBox );
01162 
01163             //if( pSoldier -> ubWhatKindOfMercAmI != MERC_TYPE__EPC ) //laltodo
01164             {
01165                   switch( iValue )
01166                   {
01167                         case( MILCON_MENU_ATTACK ):                           
01168                               {                             
01169                                     if ( (pTMilitiaSoldier->bActive) && (pTMilitiaSoldier->bInSector) && (pTMilitiaSoldier->bLife >= OKLIFE) )
01170                                     {
01171                                           // Attack !!!

01181                                           }
01182                                     }
01183

01185                                     {
01186                                           DeductPoints( pSoldier, AP_TALK, 0 );
01187                                           StatChange( pSoldier, LDRAMT, 1, FALSE );
01188                                     }
01189 
01190                                     // stop showing menu
01191                                     fShowMilitiaControlMenu = FALSE;
01192                                     giAssignHighLine = -1;
01193 
01194                                     // set dirty flag

01196                                     fMapScreenBottomDirty = TRUE;
01197                               }

01882 //void CreateDestroyMouseRegionsForTalkToAllMenu( void )
01883 //{
01884 //    static BOOLEAN fCreated = FALSE;
01885 //    UINT32 iCounter = 0;
01886 //    INT32 iFontHeight = 0;
01887 //    INT32 iBoxXPosition = 0;
01888 //    INT32 iBoxYPosition = 0;
01889 //    SGPPoint pPosition;
01890 //    INT32 iBoxWidth = 0;
01891 //    SGPRect pDimensions;
01892 //
01893 //    // will create/destroy mouse regions for the map screen assignment main menu
01894 //
01895 //    if( ( fShowTalkToAllMenu == TRUE ) && ( fCreated == FALSE ) )
01896 //    {
01897 //
01898 //          if( ( fShowTalkToAllMenu ) && ( guiCurrentScreen == MAP_SCREEN ) ) //laltodo
01899 //          {
01900 //            SetBoxPosition( ghTalkToAllBox, TalkToAllPosition );
01901 //          }
01902 //    
01903 //          HandleShadingOfLinesForTalkToAllMenu( );
01904 //
01905 //          CheckAndUpdateTacticalMilitiaControlPopUpPositions( );
01906 //
01907 //          // grab height of font
01908 //          iFontHeight = GetLineSpace( ghTalkToAllBox ) + GetFontHeight( GetBoxFont( ghTalkToAllBox ) ); 
01909 //
01910 //          // get x.y position of box
01911 //          GetBoxPosition( ghTalkToAllBox, &pPosition);
01912 //
01913 //          // grab box x and y position
01914 //          iBoxXPosition = pPosition.iX;
01915 //          iBoxYPosition = pPosition.iY;
01916 //
01917 //          // get dimensions..mostly for width
01918 //          GetBoxSize( ghTalkToAllBox, &pDimensions );
01919 //          SetBoxSecondaryShade( ghTalkToAllBox, FONT_YELLOW );
01920 //
01921 //          // get width
01922 //          iBoxWidth = pDimensions.iRight;
01923 //
01924 //          SetCurrentBox( ghTalkToAllBox );
01925 //
01926 //          // define regions
01927 //          for( iCounter = 0; iCounter < GetNumberOfLinesOfTextInBox( ghTalkToAllBox ); iCounter++ )
01928 //          {
01929 //                // add mouse region for each line of text..and set user data
01930 //          
01931 //
01932 //                MSYS_DefineRegion( &gTalkToAllMenuRegion[ iCounter ],       ( INT16 )( iBoxXPosition ), ( INT16 )( iBoxYPosition + GetTopMarginSize( ghTalkToAllBox ) + ( iFontHeight ) * iCounter ), ( INT16 )( iBoxXPosition + iBoxWidth ), ( INT16 )( iBoxYPosition + GetTopMarginSize( ghTalkToAllBox ) + ( iFontHeight ) * ( iCounter + 1 ) ), MSYS_PRIORITY_HIGHEST - 3 ,
01933 //                                         MSYS_NO_CURSOR, TalkToAllMenuMvtCallBack, TalkToAllMenuBtnCallback );
01934 //
01935 //                // set user defines
01936 //                MSYS_SetRegionUserData( &gTalkToAllMenuRegion[ iCounter ], 0, iCounter );
01937 //          }
01938 //
01939 //          // created
01940 //          fCreated = TRUE;
01941 //
01942 //          // unhighlight all strings in box
01943 //          UnHighLightBox( ghTalkToAllBox );
01944 //
01945 //    }
01946 //    else if( ( ( fShowMilitiaControlMenu == FALSE ) || ( fShowTalkToAllMenu == FALSE ) ) && ( fCreated == TRUE ) )
01947 //    {
01948 //          // destroy 
01949 //          for( iCounter = 0; iCounter < GetNumberOfLinesOfTextInBox( ghTalkToAllBox ); iCounter++ )
01950 //          {
01951 //                MSYS_RemoveRegion( &gTalkToAllMenuRegion[ iCounter ] );
01952 //          }
01953 //
01954 //          // stop showing TalkToAll menu
01955 //          if( fShowMilitiaControlMenu == FALSE )
01956 //          {
01957 //                fShowTalkToAllMenu = FALSE;
01958 //          }
01959 //
01960 //          RestorePopUpBoxes( );
01961 //
01962 //          fMapPanelDirty = TRUE;
01963 //          fCharacterInfoPanelDirty= TRUE;
01964 //          fTeamPanelDirty = TRUE;
01965 //          fMapScreenBottomDirty = TRUE;
01966 //          HideBox( ghTalkToAllBox );
01967 //          SetRenderFlags( RENDER_FLAG_FULL );
01968 //          
01969 //          // not created
01970 //          fCreated = FALSE;
01971 //
01972 //          if ( fShowMilitiaControlMenu )
01973 //          {
01974 //                // remove highlight on the parent menu
01975 //                UnHighLightBox( ghMilitiaControlBox );
01976 //          }
01977 //    }

01993 //    {
01994 //          // highlight string
01995 //
01996 //          // do not highlight current balance
01997 //          if( GetBoxShadeFlag( ghTalkToAllBox, iValue ) == FALSE )
01998 //          {
01999 //            // get the string line handle
02000 //            HighLightBoxLine( ghTalkToAllBox, iValue );

02004 //    {
02005 //          // unhighlight all strings in box

02012 //void TalkToAllMenuBtnCallback( MOUSE_REGION * pRegion, INT32 iReason )
02013 //{
02014 //    // btn callback handler for assignment region
02015 //    INT32 iValue = -1;
02016 //    SOLDIERTYPE * pSoldier = NULL;
02017 //
02018 //    iValue = MSYS_GetRegionUserData( pRegion, 0 );
02019 //
02020 //    //if( ( iReason & MSYS_CALLBACK_REASON_LBUTTON_DWN ) || ( iReason & MSYS_CALLBACK_REASON_RBUTTON_DWN ) )
02021 //    //{
02022 //    //    if ( (guiTacticalInterfaceFlags & INTERFACE_MAPSCREEN ) && !fShowMapInventoryPool )
02023 //    //    {

02029 //    {

02033 //                {

02043 //                      giAssignHighLine = -1;
02044 //                }
02045 //                break;
02046 //
02047 //                case( TTALL_MENU_HOLD ):                                    
02048 //                {
02049 //                      //Hold Position !!!
02050 //                      ScreenMsg( FONT_WHITE, MSG_INTERFACE, L"Hold Position" );
02051 //                      
02052 //                      pTMilitiaSoldier->bOrders = STATIONARY;
02053 //                      //pTMilitiaSoldier->bAttitude = DEFENSIVE;
02054 //
02055 //                      // stop showing menu
02056 //                      fShowMilitiaControlMenu = FALSE;
02057 //                      //fShowTalkToAllMenu = FALSE;
02058 //                      giAssignHighLine = -1;
02059 //                }
02060 //                break;
02061 //
02062 //                case( TTALL_MENU_RETREAT ):
02063 //                {
02064 //                      // Retreat !!!
02065 //                      ScreenMsg( FONT_WHITE, MSG_INTERFACE, L"Retreat" );
02066 //                      
02067 //                      pTMilitiaSoldier->bOrders = FARPATROL;
02068 //                      //pTMilitiaSoldier->bAttitude = DEFENSIVE;
02069 //
02070 //                      // set up next action to run away
02071 //                      pTMilitiaSoldier->usNextActionData = FindSpotMaxDistFromOpponents( pTMilitiaSoldier );
02072 //                      if ( pTMilitiaSoldier->usNextActionData != NOWHERE )
02073 //                      {
02074 //                            pTMilitiaSoldier->bNextAction = AI_ACTION_RUN_AWAY;
02075 //                            pTMilitiaSoldier->usActionData = ANIM_STAND;
02076 //                            //return( AI_ACTION_STOP_COWERING );
02077 //                      }
02078 //
02079 //                      // stop showing menu
02080 //                      fShowMilitiaControlMenu = FALSE;
02081 //                      //fShowTalkToAllMenu = FALSE;
02082 //                      giAssignHighLine = -1;
02083 //                }
02084 //                break;
02085 //
02086 //
02087 //                case( TTALL_MENU_COMETOME ):
02088 //                {
02089 //                      ScreenMsg( FONT_WHITE, MSG_INTERFACE, L"Come to me" );
02090 //

02092 //                      SOLDIERTYPE *           pTeamSoldier;
02093 //                      INT16 sActionGridNo, sGridNo, sAdjustedGridNo;
02094 //                      UINT8 ubDirection;
02095 //

02097 //

02099 //                      {
02100 //                            if ( pTeamSoldier->bActive && pTeamSoldier->bInSector && pTeamSoldier->bLife > 0 )
02101 //                            {
02102 //
02103 //                                  if ( GetSoldier( &pSoldier, gusSelectedSoldier )  )
02104 //                                  {
02105 //                                        // OK, find an adjacent gridno....
02106 //                                        sGridNo = pSoldier->sGridNo;
02107 //
02108 //                                        // See if we can get there to punch 
02109 //                                        sActionGridNo =  FindAdjacentGridEx( pSoldier, sGridNo, &ubDirection, &sAdjustedGridNo, TRUE, FALSE );
02110 //                                        if ( sActionGridNo != -1 )

02119 //                                              if ( pTeamSoldier->sGridNo != sActionGridNo )
02120 //                                              {
02121 //                                                    // WALK UP TO DEST FIRST
02122 //                                                    SendGetNewSoldierPathEvent( pTeamSoldier, sActionGridNo, pTeamSoldier->usUIMovementMode );
02123 //                                              }
02124 //                                        }
02125 //                                  }
02126 //                            }
02127 //                      }
02128 //
02129 //                      // stop showing menu
02130 //                      fShowMilitiaControlMenu = FALSE;
02131 //                      //fShowTalkToAllMenu = FALSE;
02132 //                      giAssignHighLine = -1;
02133 //                }
02134 //                break;
02135 //
02136 //                case( TTALL_MENU_GETDOWN ):
02137 //                {
02138 //                      // Get Down !!!
02139 //                      ScreenMsg( FONT_WHITE, MSG_INTERFACE, L"Get Down" );
02140 //
02141 //                      SendChangeSoldierStanceEvent( pTMilitiaSoldier, ANIM_PRONE );
02142 //                      //SendChangeSoldierStanceEvent( pTMilitiaSoldier, ANIM_CROUCH );
02143 //
02144 //                      // stop showing menu
02145 //                      fShowMilitiaControlMenu = FALSE;
02146 //                      //fShowTalkToAllMenu = FALSE;
02147 //                      giAssignHighLine = -1;
02148 //                }
02149 //                break;

02152 //                {
